JOHN 12.47 jah jabai ƕas meinaim hausjai waurdam jah galaubjai, ik ni stoja ina;
nih þan qam ei stojau manased, ak ei ganasjau manased.
JOHN 12.48 saei frakann mis jah ni andnimiþ waurda meina, habaid þana stojandan sik.
waurd þatei rodida, þata stojiþ ina in spedistin daga.
JOHN 12.49 unte ik us mis silbin ni rodida, ak saei sandida mik atta, sah mis anabusn atgaf...
...JOHN 13.11 qaþ:
ni allai hrainjai sijuþ.
JOHN 13.12 Biþeh þan usþwoh fotuns ize jah nam wastjos seinos, anakumbjands aftra qaþ du im:
witudu ƕa gatawida izwis?
JOHN 13.13 jus wopeid mik:
laisareis jah frauja.
waila qiþiþ,
im auk.
JOHN 13.14 jabai nu ik usþwoh izwis fotuns, frauja jah laisareis, jah jus skuluþ izwis misso þwahan fotuns.
JOHN 13.15 du frisahtai auk atgaf izwis, ei swaswe ik gatawida izwis, swa jus taujaiþ.
JOHN 13.16 amen amen qiþa izwis:
nist skalks maiza fraujin seinamma, nih apaustaulus maiza þamma sandjandin sik.
JOHN 13.17 þande þata wituþ, audagai sijuþ, jabai taujiþ þata.
JOHN 13.18 ni bi allans izwis qiþa.
ik wait ƕarjans gawalida;
ak ei usfulliþ waurþi þata gamelido:
saei matida miþ mis hlaib, ushof ana mik fairzna seina.
JOHN 13.19 fram himma qiþa izwis, faurþizei waurþi, ei biþe wairþai, galaubjaiþ þatei ik im.
JOHN 13.20 amen amen qiþa izwis:
saei andnimiþ þana þanei ik insandja, mik andnimiþ;
iþ saei mik andnimiþ, andnimiþ þana sandjandan mik.
JOHN 13.21 þata qiþands Iesus indrobnoda ahmin jah weitwodida jah qaþ:
amen amen, qiþa izwis þatei ains izwara galeweiþ mik.
JOHN 13.22 þanuh seƕun du sis misso þai siponjos, þagkjandans bi ƕarjana qeþi.
JOHN 13.23 wasuh þan anakumbjands ains þize siponje is in barma Iesuis, þanei frijoda Iesus.
JOHN 13.24 bandwiduh þan þamma Seimon Paitrus du fraihnan ƕas wesi, bi þanei qaþ.
JOHN 13.25 anakumbida þan jains swa ana barma Iesuis qaþuh imma:
frauja, ƕas ist?
JOHN 13.26 andhof Iesus:
sa ist þammei ik ufdaupjands þana hlaif giba.
jah ufdaupjands þana hlaif gaf Iudin Seimonis, Skariotau.
JOHN 13.27 jah afar þamma hlaiba þan galaiþ in jainana Satana.
qaþ þan du imma Iesus:
þatei taujis, tawei sprauto.
JOHN 13.28 þatuh þan ainshun ni wissa þize anakumbjandane, duƕe qaþ imma.
JOHN 13.29 sumai mundedun, ei unte arka habaida Iudas, þatei qeþi imma Iesus: bugei þizei þaurbeima du dulþai, aiþþau þaim unledam ei ƕa gibau.
JOHN 13.30 biþe andnam þana hlaib jains, suns galaiþ ut.
wasuh þan nahts, þan galaiþ ut.
JOHN 13.31 qaþ þan Iesus:
nu gasweraids warþ sunus mans, jah guþ hauhiþs ist in imma.
JOHN 13.32 jabai nu guþ hauhiþs ist in imma, jah guþ hauheiþ ina in sis jah suns hauhida ina.
JOHN 13.33 barnilona, nauh leitil mel miþ izwis im.
sokeiþ mik, jah swaswe qaþ du Iudaium, ei þadei ik gagga, jus ni maguþ qiman, jah izwis qiþa nu.
JOHN 13.34 anabusn niuja giba izwis, ei frijoþ izwis misso
swe ik frijoda izwis, þei jah jus frijoþ misso izwis.
JOHN 13.35 bi þamma ufkunnand allai, þei meinai siponjos sijuþ, jabai friaþwa habaid miþ izwis misso.
JOHN 13.36 þanuh qaþ du imma Seimon Paitrus:
frauja, ƕad gaggis?
andhafjands Iesus qaþ:
þadei ik gagga, ni magt mik nu laistjan;
iþ biþe laisteis.
JOHN 13.37 þaruh Paitrus qaþ du imma:
frauja, duƕe ni mag þuk laistjan nu?
saiwala meina faur þuk lagja.
JOHN 13.38 andhof Iesus:
saiwala þeina faur mik lagjis?
amen amen qiþa þus, þei hana ni hrukeiþ, unte þu mik afaikis kunnan þrim sinþam.
JOHN 14.1 Ni indrobnai izwar hairto;
galaubeiþ du guda jah du mis galaubeiþ.
JOHN 14.2 in garda attins meinis saliþwos managos sind;
aþþan niba weseina, aiþþau qeþjau du izwis:
